abstract: Lance Berkman of the St. Louis Cardinals was named the National League's comeback player of the year.
snippet: Lance Berkman of the St. Louis Cardinals was named the National League's comeback player of the year.
lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS - Lance Berkman of the Cardinals, who on Thursday was named the National League comeback player of the year, took time before Game 4 of the league championship series to ruminate on his turnaround this season.

headline.main: A Comeback Hatched in the 2010 A.L.C.S.
